Uses of Interface
io.helidon.webserver.ServerRequest.Reader

  • Packages that use ServerRequest.Reader 
    Package Description
    io.helidon.webserver
    Reactive web server API.
    io.helidon.webserver.json
    This package contains JSON-P (javax.json) support for WebServer's Routing.

    • Uses of ServerRequest.Reader in io.helidon.webserver

      Classes in io.helidon.webserver that implement ServerRequest.Reader 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  StringContentReader
      The StringContentReader provides means to convert a ByteBuffer publisher to a single string while using a given charset.
      Methods in io.helidon.webserver that return ServerRequest.Reader 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static ServerRequest.Reader<byte[]> ContentReaders.byteArrayReader​()
      The returned reader provides means to convert a ByteBuffer publisher to an array of bytes.
      static ServerRequest.Reader<InputStream> ContentReaders.inputStreamReader​()
      Creates a reader that bridges Flow API IO to a blocking Java InputStream.
      Methods in io.helidon.webserver with parameters of type ServerRequest.Reader 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <T> void ServerRequest.Content.registerReader​(Class<T> type, ServerRequest.Reader<T> reader)
      Registers a reader for a later use with an appropriate ServerRequest.Content.as(Class) method call.
      <T> void ServerRequest.Content.registerReader​(Predicate<Class<?>> predicate, ServerRequest.Reader<T> reader)
      Registers a reader for a later use with an appropriate ServerRequest.Content.as(Class) method call.
